name: Flamelings & Slimes
description:
This is my first ever published game!

It's my submission for the weekly game jam - week 168, theme: Pass the Torch.

In this game you play as a Flameling (A little ball of fire with eyes) and your goal is to survive and score as many points as you can by throwing Fireballs into a Torch. However, there are adventurers roaming around the dungeon that you must avoid! Every adventurer hit will decay the torch so be sure to pay attention! The dungeon also contains a slime that will try to bounce on your head decaying the torch aswell. Be careful and have fun!
